title: Strawberry milkshake

ingredients.content: 300 g vanilla ice cream, cut into pieces

preparations.content: Place strawberries, vanilla ice cream, ice cubes (optional), caster sugar and full cream milk into mixing bowl and blend <b>1 min/speed 7<b>. Serve immediately.

hintsAndTricks: Substitute strawberries with any other fruit such as raspberries, apricots or bananas.
<b>Coffee milkshake<b>: omit fruit, replace vanilla ice cream with coffee ice cream and add 1 tsp instant coffee.
<b>Chocolate milkshake<b>: omit fruit, replace vanilla ice cream with chocolate ice cream and add 1 tbsp cocoa powder.
